alt.description: Used in combination with src or srcSet to provide an alt attribute for the rendered img element.
alt.description_zh: Used in combination with src or srcSet to provide an alt attribute for the rendered img element.

children.description: Used to render icon or text elements inside the Avatar if src is not set. This can be an element, or just a string.
children.description_zh: Used to render icon or text elements inside the Avatar if src is not set. This can be an element, or just a string.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
component.description_zh: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.

imgProps.description: Attributes applied to the img element if the component is used to display an image. It can be used to listen for the loading error event.Deprecated - Use slotProps.img instead. This prop will be removed in v7. How to migrate.
imgProps.description_zh: Attributes applied to the img element if the component is used to display an image. It can be used to listen for the loading error event.Deprecated - Use slotProps.img instead. This prop will be removed in v7. How to migrate.

sizes.description: The sizes attribute for the img element.
sizes.description_zh: The sizes attribute for the img element.

slotProps.description: The props used for each slot inside.
slotProps.description_zh: The props used for each slot inside.

slots.description: The components used for each slot inside.
slots.description_zh: The components used for each slot inside.

src.description: The src attribute for the img element.
src.description_zh: The src attribute for the img element.

srcSet.description: The srcSet attribute for the img element. Use this attribute for responsive image display.
srcSet.description_zh: The srcSet attribute for the img element. Use this attribute for responsive image display.

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
